div.p: LET'S SEE IF IT'LL GIVE WAY.
WHEN THEY GIVE IT TO YOU, JIM?
NO, NO. NO, I NEVER EAT
LET ME SEE ALL OF IT.

p.span: YOU HAVE A DEITY OR DEITIES

div.p: TO SEE WHAT THEY LOOK LIKE
YOU KNOW THIS TO BE TRUE.
I HAVE NO TIME FOR YOU,
I'LL STATE THAT I WARNED YOU
IF IT HAS NONE TO YOU...
LOVE TO TEACH IT TO YOU.
HE SNEAK POWERED DOWN A BIT.
